screen.userinput: ./configure -prefix /opt/qt-&qt-version; -qt-gif -system-libpng \ -system-libmng -system-zlib -system-libjpeg -no-g++-exceptions \ -thread && make && make install && if test -L /opt/qt; then rm /opt/qt; fi && ln -s /opt/qt-&qt-version; /opt/qt && cp -r doc/man /opt/qt/doc && cp -r examples /opt/qt/doc
